document.full_text: the pentagon is considering allowing the families of detainees at guantanamo bay, cuba, to visit them, the washington post reported on wednesday, citing congressional aides.
document.title: guantanamo detainees may get family visits: report
lines_and_colors: the pentagon is considering allowing the families of detainees at guantanamo bay, cuba, to visit them, the washington post reported on wednesday, citing congressional aides.
